mapper.select: select h.hotelName ,h.hotelAddress ,g.hotelGrade ,t.roomTypeName ,t.maxPeople from hotel h, hotelGrade g, RoomType t, Room r where h.hotelGradeID=g.hotelgradeID and r.roomTypeID=t.roomTypeID and h.hotelID = r.hotelID and h.hotelCity = #{hotelCity} and t.maxPeople >= #{maxPeople}
select eventTitle ,eventcontent ,startdate ,enddate ,discount from event where startdate <= #{today} and enddate >= #{today}

select h.hotelName ,h.hotelAddress ,g.hotelGrade ,t.roomTypeName ,t.maxPeople from hotel h, hotelGrade g, RoomType t, Room r, Reservation rv where h.hotelGradeID=g.hotelgradeID and r.roomTypeID=t.roomTypeID and h.hotelID = r.hotelID and r.roomid = rv.roomid and h.hotelName = #{hotelName}

select r.reservationID ,r.userID ,h.hotelname ,r.checkindate ,r.checkoutdate ,r.payStatus ,r.price from Reservation r, room m,hotel h where userID=#{userID} and m.roomID=r.roomID and m.hotelID=h.hotelID
